Digital Camera Adapters

Accu-Beam® Digital SLR, Smartphone, and Blackmagic Camera Adapters.

Capture high quality slit lamp and microscope photographs with almost any camera using our patented interchangeable lens and mount systems.

Smartphone adapters ensure compatibility with a wide range of slit lamps at any budget.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”73708″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73338″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/all-in-one/” css=”.vc_custom_1581354419074{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1586892754920{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

All-in-One SLR Adapter

The Accu-Beam® All-in-One adapter combines a beamsplitter and SLR adapter for a one-piece imaging solution compatible with APS-C cameras.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72360″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/slr-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364140218{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581515404591{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Digital SLR Adapter

The Accu-Beam® Digital SLR Adapter is a modular solution that can connect almost any camera to a beamsplitter.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72366″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/smartphone-adapter/” css=”.vc_custom_1572476298619{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581615365909{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Universal Smartphone Adapter

Capable of connecting almost any Smartphone to any Slit Lamp the Accu-Beam® Smartphone Adapter is a low-cost solution with impressive results.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72370″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/oculocam/” css=”.vc_custom_1572476639397{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581615376732{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Oculocam System

The Oculocam System is the most cost-effective way to connect a smartphone or digital camera to your slit lamp.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569436712252{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72832″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/beamsplitters/” css=”.vc_custom_1574808886780{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581615386109{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Beamsplitters

ACCU-Beam® Dual Port and Single Port Beamsplitters are compatible with slit lamps and microscopes made by Zeiss, Topcon, Marco, Reichert, Haag-Streit, and other manufacturers.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72906″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/digital-adapters/beamsplitter-adapters/” css=”.vc_custom_1581445431030{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581615398629{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Beamsplitter Adapters

ACCU-BEAM® Beamsplitter Adapters can convert almost any beamsplitter to a Zeiss exit port, compatible with all of our products.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
